name: Plague Doctor
description: A humanoid entity known for its medical capabilities. It can kill humans by touching them and then revive them as "zombies". It is to be contained in a standard humanoid containment cell.
containment_procedures: SCP-049 is to be contained in a standard humanoid containment cell.

name: Shy Guy
description: A tall, emaciated humanoid with heightened aggression. If it sees its own face, it will become enraged and attack anything in its path. It is to be kept in a steel cube at all times.
containment_procedures: SCP-096 is to be kept in a steel cube at all times.

name: The Old Man
description: An elderly humanoid with corrosive properties. It can create a pocket dimension that it can travel to and from at will. It is to be contained within a sealed container filled with acid.
containment_procedures: SCP-106 is to be contained within a sealed container filled with acid.

name: The Sculpture
description: A statue-like entity that moves when unobserved. It can kill humans by snapping their necks. It is to be observed at all times by at least two personnel.
containment_procedures: SCP-173 is to be observed at all times by at least two personnel.

name: The Hard-to-Destroy Reptile
description: A highly adaptive, reptilian creature with extreme hostility. It cannot be killed or contained permanently. It is currently being kept in a specially designed acid-resistant chamber.
containment_procedures: SCP-682 is currently being kept in a specially designed acid-resistant chamber.
